column4: this is almost a year, an i still can't see where the applications are on this os
nothing changed after typing in terminal: f-prot
alt f2 gnome-terminal and type which f-prot
nothing changed either (after doing alt f2, wrting f-prot in the box)
yes i do pay attention, i need to get rid of viruses, and maybe rootkits on my drives
apt-cache search rootkit for apps to deal with that
i have that clamav thing; it just locks out, or just can't find nothing the things which f-prot could find in windows
is this a mail server for windows machines?
which version of ubuntu are you using?
no it is not, this is hardy heron
there is no real threat of viruses on linux
